summary: An air ambulance can quickly transport you to a hospital in an emergency. But how much could it cost you? The data we reviewed indicated that in 2017, about 2/3 of air ambulance transports for patients with private insurance were out-of-network. Generally, insurance only pays for a portion of an out-of-network service. In that case, you could be billed for the difference between what the...
title: Air Ambulance: Available Data Show Privately-Insured Patients Are at Financial Risk
